hadiths.text: Narrated Jarir bin Abdullah: I gave the pledge of allegiance to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) for the following: 1. offer prayers perfectly 2. pay the Zakat (obligatory charity) 3. and be sincere and true to every Muslim

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: «الدِّينُ النَّصِيحَةُ لِلَّهِ وَلِرَسُولِهِ وَلأَئِمَّةِ الْمُسْلِمِينَ وَعَامَّتِهِمْ»
chapter.eng-name: The statement of the Prophet (ﷺ): Religion is An-Nasihah (to be sincere and true) to Allah, to His Messenger (Muhammad (ﷺ)), to the Muslim rulers, and to all the Muslims
